about_the_game:
Game description

Background of the game:
The little sisters seem to have a very important date, but unfortunately the road to the appointment is still not smooth, now they need your help more than ever to cross the obstacles, quickly use the flexibility to jump or climb to reach the appointment!
The girls will definitely thank you~❤
Gameplay introduction:
Players need to control the character by jumping or climbing, to achieve a variety of obstacles across the terrain or avoid and cross the trap, to reach the final target point to win.
Game features:
In the game, you will experience.
- 11 beautiful CG
- Brand new animation vertical drawing
- A unique world view
- A variety of interactive gameplay
- Challenging levels (guaranteed not to make things difficult for you)
- One click to skip
Little sisters do not like toys and puppies, so they sadly left the place (this work will not appear to help him content), but this has not been quiet for a few days, a new group of cute and interesting girls moved in, immediately became lively again, they also quickly get along to become good friends.

Character List

Character: Rabbit
Setting: Cute and meta, with the nature of a rabbit

Character: Cow
Setting: Dull and cute, as if always asleep

Character: Sheep
Setting: Looks soft and fluffy, but I hear she always seems to be getting into trouble

Character: Snake
Setting: A gentle, caring big sister who you can talk to about any troubles

Character: Mouse
Setting: Short and small girl, but not very forgiving on the mouth

About Us


Hello, we are Lovely Game, desire, throbbing, we are eager to give you the purest romance.
Because we want to provide you with a more convenient gaming experience, we have now launched the official Lovely Games website, so you can get our latest information anytime, anywhere, and if you encounter any problems in the game, you can also choose to raise them in the community F&Q discussion or the official steam group~.
Thanks for the love.

content_descriptors.notes:
This game may contain content that is not suitable for all ages or for viewing at work: nudity or pornography, general adult content, sexually suggestive language, sexy poses.
All characters involved in pornography are over the age of 18.

name: Zodiac fantasy 2

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Gef750
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: The little sisters have an important date (maybe several!) Now they need your help to cross the obstacles, use jumping or climbing flexibly to reach the date, the girls will thank you for it!
supported_languages:
English, Russian, Japanese*, Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese, Korean
*languages with full audio support
